title: Who Are Alfa Romeo Owned By?
snippet: Before Stellantis, Alfa Romeo was controlled by Fiat, which took full ownership in the 1980s.

title: Who Owns Alfa Romeo? | Who Makes Alfa Romeo? | Zeigler Alfa Romeo of Schaumburg
snippet: Alfa Romeo became Alfa Romeo Automobiles S.p.A, which was adopted as a subsidiary of Fiat. Fiat then was known as Fiat-Chrysler Automobiles (FCA), and after 2007, was responsible for making Alfa Romeo vehicles.
